title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22ยง 1.2 - Chief Administrator of the Courts; compensation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22ยง 1.2 - Chief Administrator of the Courts; compensation

State Regulations

The salary of the Chief Administrator shall
be fixed by the Chief Judge within the amount available by appropriation. He
shall also be entitled to reimbursement for expenses actually and necessarily
incurred by him in the performance of his duties. If a judge is appointed, he
shall receive his judicial salary and such additional compensation as may be
available by appropriation, and his actual and necessary
expenses. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22ยง
1.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
